summary: A tragicomic movie which focuses on two women and their daily struggle for survival during a summer in Berlin. Katrin, a jobless single mom, and Nike, a nurse, live in the same house and ... See full summary »
cast: Inka Friedrich|Nadja Uhl|Andreas Schmidt|Stephanie Schönfeld|Christel Peters|Kurt Radeke|Vincent Redetzki|Hannes Stelzer|Lil Oggesen|Maximilian Moritz|Veit Schubert|Fritz Roth|Traute Hoess|Olaf Burmeister|Herbert Olschok|Lutz Ockhardt|Barbara Bachmann|Götz Schulte|Frank Seppeler|Anne Bulling|Ute Keller|Manuela Fritzsche|Manfred Hille|Hans-Ulrich Laux|Olaf Sommerfeld|Mario Pokatzky|Marko Schmidt|Matthias Walter|Frank Fietze|Carola Kirschnick|Axel Prahl
title: Verano en el balcón
